text: 9.13: Hos 6.6; Mt 12.7; Mk 2.17; Ru 5.32; 1 T 1.15Nde ŋgɨp Fhe Bakɨmen buni vhuuiŋ ki gavar ki buni ganɨp, kha nde Fhe Bakɨme buna nɨɨeŋ kaŋgirga, ‘Gu nde fhura na nzuav shama mbui shaa, gu nta vuzvugi fhuvara. Gu guigira khueŋ vuzvugi, nde guigira tɨvir vhuuiŋra harigi ntɨɨri muuŋv guigira mbe vuzvugiri.’ ” Zisas wom khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Gu tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui gumgir kamɨ za zɨgi fhuvara. Gu tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbui gumgir kamɨn za zɨgi.”
